chest_pain.description: Pain, pressure, or discomfort in chest area
emergency_indicators: Pain radiating to arm, jaw, neck, or back
Associated with shortness of breath, sweating, or nausea
chest_pain.immediate_action: Call emergency services immediately. Do not drive yourself. Chew aspirin if not allergic.

difficulty_breathing.description: Trouble breathing or feeling of suffocation
emergency_indicators: Rapid breathing over 30 breaths per minute
Using neck or chest muscles to breathe
difficulty_breathing.immediate_action: Call emergency services. Sit upright. Use rescue inhaler if available.
